__e: 3/Al Imran-55: And Allah said: “O Jesus! It is surely I who will make you die and cause you ascend to Me, and cleans you of those who disbelieve, and set those who depend on (follow) you above those who disbelieve until the Day of Resurrection. Then to Me shall be your return. Then I will judge between you concerning that in which you used to differ”.
